////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////																////
////				      This ImageJ toolset allows to access ImageJ macros				////
////				      that help in the analysis of PointTracker data using R.				////
////																////
////							Florent Pantin, 2013							////
////																////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////


// This file should be placed in the "ImageJ\macros\toolsets\" folder.
// It will then appear in the >> menu.
// Make sure that the ImageJ path in each macro action tool corresponds to the one existing on your computer.


var pathOfMacros = getDirectory("imagej") + "macros\\Track 'n' R\\";
var pathOfMacros = replace(pathOfMacros, "PROGRA~1", "Program Files");
var pathOfMacros = replace(pathOfMacros, "PROGRA~2", "Program Files (x86)");
var pathOfUserGuide = pathOfMacros + "Help\\Track 'n' R - UserGuide.pdf";

macro "Draw leaf outlines Action Tool - "
	{
	run("Install...", "install=[" + pathOfMacros + "Draw_Leaf_Outlines.txt]");
	run("Draw_Leaf_Outlines");
	}

macro "Replot growth from PointTracker Action Tool - "
	{
	run("Install...", "install=[" + pathOfMacros + "Replot_Growth_From_PointTracker.txt]");
	run("Replot_Growth_From_PointTracker");
	}

macro "Plot growth Action Tool - "
	{
	run("Install...", "install=[" + pathOfMacros + "Plot_Growth.txt]");
	run("Plot_Growth");
	}

macro "Plot contours Action Tool - "
	{
	run("Install...", "install=[" + pathOfMacros + "Plot_Kriging.txt]");
	run("Plot_Kriging");
	}

macro "Plot cell division Action Tool - "
	{
	run("Install...", "install=[" + pathOfMacros + "Plot_Division.txt]");
	run("Plot_Division");
	}

macro "Plot growth, contours or division at regular Intervals Action Tool - "
	{
	run("Install...", "install=[" + pathOfMacros + "Plot_Intervals.txt]");
	run("Plot_Intervals");
	}

macro "Analyze lineages Action Tool - "
	{
	run("Install...", "install=[" + pathOfMacros + "Analyze_Lineages.txt]");
	run("Analyze_Lineages");
	}

macro "Track 'n' R Help Action Tool - "
	{
	showMessageWithCancel("This toolset allows the analysis of PointTracker data using R.\n \nAuthor: Florent Pantin, 2013-2018\n \nA user guide is available in the Help subfolder. Open it with your default PDF reader?");
	exec("cmd /c C:\\Windows\\explorer.exe \""+ pathOfUserGuide +"\"");
	}
